meanings.definition: Not discouraged or prevented from acting
meanings.sent1: She was undeterred by the storm and continued to play outside.
meanings.sent2: The undeterred hiker climbed the mountain despite the challenging weather.
meanings.sent3: The undeterred squirrel kept trying to reach the bird feeder, even after falling multiple times.
meanings.sent4: Like a fearless warrior, he charged into battle undeterred by the enemy's numbers.
meanings.sent5: Her undeterred determination shone brightly in the face of adversity.

meanings.definition: Not discouraged or prevented from continuing
meanings.sent1: The undeterred student kept studying for the exam even late into the night.
meanings.sent2: Despite the setbacks, the undeterred athlete pushed forward in the race.
meanings.sent3: The undeterred marathon runner kept going, even when his shoelaces came untied.
meanings.sent4: She approached each challenge undeterred, always looking for a way to overcome it.
meanings.sent5: His undeterred spirit inspired those around him to never give up.
